description: Rules for modal and dynamic state testing

example: US-009: Wire up modal flow (state management)

testingRule.description: When verifying a modal or dynamic state
steps: Trigger the action that opens/shows the state
Take screenshot WITH the state visible
Do NOT just verify code exists - verify it RENDERS correctly

backNavigation.description: Back buttons should navigate to previous modal, NOT just close
backNavigation.pattern: Close current modal AND open previous modal

rtlHeaders.layout: Title at START (RIGHT), Back button at END (LEFT)
